fields.description:
Fields specifies which fields to return (optional)
If not specified, returns all available fields

input.description:
Input is the text to search for if PlaceID is not provided
Example: "Eiffel Tower", "Paris, France"

language.description: Language is the language code for the results (optional)

place_id.description: PlaceID is the unique identifier for the place (from typeahead results)
